row.process:
:SET &CHECK# = 0 : IF &UC4RB_WAS_FILE_PATH# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_WAS_APPLICATION_NAME# <> "" : SET &CHECK# = &CHECK# + 1 : ENDIF :IF &CHECK# = 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "Either File Path or Application Name must be provided." :ENDIF :IF &CHECK# = 2 : STOP MSG, 50, "Both File Path or Application Name should not be provided." :ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_WAS_MODULE_OPERATION# = "Install" : IF &UC4RB_WAS_FILE_PATH# = "" : STOP MSG, 50, "File Path must be provided for Install operation." : ENDIF : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_WAS_APPLICATION_NAME# = "" : STOP MSG, 50, "Application Name must be provided for Edit operation." : ENDIF : ENDIF
@echo off
!------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
! Host : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_HOST#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Port : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Username : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! WSAdmin Tool Bin Directory : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "WSAdmin Tool Bin Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! File Path : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "File Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_FILE_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Application Name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_APPLICATION_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Module Operation : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Module Operation" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_MODULE_OPERATION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Advanced Options : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Advanced Options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WAS_ADV_OPTIONS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! logging start of execution : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!-------------------------------------------------Forming the command-------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#\wsadmin.bat"
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION
: INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RES : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = "java -jar ""&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar"" arb -cmd execute &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#"
! Username : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -username &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Password : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_PASSWORD# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -password &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: IF &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# <> "" ! Host : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#," -host &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Port : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_PORT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -port &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Advanced Options : IF &UC4RB_WAS_ADV_OPTIONS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_WAS_ADV_OPTIONS#") : ENDIF
! Attach python file to prepare running : ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "MAP_MODULES_TO_SERVERS", T : SET &FILENAME# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#, "pck_websphere_map_modules_to_servers.py") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " -f ""&FILENAME#""")
: SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " ""&UC4RB_WAS_WSADMINLIB#""") : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " ""&UC4RB_WAS_UTILSLIB#""")
! File Path : IF &UC4RB_WAS_FILE_PATH# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Application name : IF &UC4RB_WAS_APPLICATION_NAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_APPLICATION_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Modules ! Get File path : SET &AGENT_TEMPDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_TEMPDIR#,"map_modules_to_servers-&$RUNID#.txt") : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = &UC4RB_WAS_MODULES# ! Creating file in the temp dir : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH#=&UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_FILE
! Process file content : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#,&UC4RB_FILE_PATH#,,,,'UC_LOGIN=&LOGIN#') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : IF &LINE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_MODULES_FILE_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_MODULES_FILE_CONTENT#, &LINE#) : SET &UC4RB_MODULES_FILE_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_MODULES_FILE_CONTENT#, " ** ") : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
: SET &CONTENT_LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_MODULES_FILE_CONTENT#) : SET &POS# = &CONTENT_LENGTH#-4 : SET &UC4RB_MODULES_FILE_CONTENT# = SUBSTR(&UC4RB_MODULES_FILE_CONTENT#,1,&POS#) : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_MODULES_FILE_CONTENT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Module Operation : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_WAS_MODULE_OPERATION# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_ADD_QUOTATION : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! logging the command : PRINT &UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
! Invoking java binary &UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH#,,"TASK"
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** MAP MODULES TO SERVERS ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** MAP MODULES TO SERVERS ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER AGENT# = &AGENT# : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER LOGIN# = &LOGIN# : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL# = "YES" : PUT_PROMPT_BUFFER UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# = &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : SET &UC4RB_WEBSPHERE_OBJ# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.DELETE" : SET &ACTOBJ# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(&UC4RB_WEBSPHERE_OBJ#,WAIT) : IF &ACTOBJ# = "0" : SET &ERRNR# = SYS_LAST_ERR_NR() : SET &ERRINS# = SYS_LAST_ERR_INS() : SET &MESSAGE# = GET_MSG_TXT(&ERRNR#,&ERRINS#) : PRINT "Error while activating &UC4RB_WEBSPHERE_OBJ# object :&MESSAGE#" : ELSE : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,&ACTOBJ#,"RETCODE") : P "EXECUTED OBJECT [&UC4RB_WEBSPHERE_OBJ#] STATUS: &STATUS#" : IF &STATUS# <> "0" : PRINT "Error while executing &UC4RB_WEBSPHERE_OBJ# object" : ENDIF : ENDIF
